title: Todo App

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: News Site
description: A website that gets data from a news API and emails this news to a specific email address.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

description: A script that chacks the future forecast and plots a graph based on its customisable readings

title: Book Anyalisis
description: A program that uses jupyter to learn more about a specific book.

title: Tour Scraper
description: A program that web scrapes upcoming tours of a page and emails you if there are any tours.
